nml_option.name: config_AM_testComputeInterval_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member test_compute_interval is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_testComputeInterval_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_testComputeInterval_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_testComputeInterval_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_testComputeInterval_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that should be tied to the test_compute_interval analysis member

package.name: testComputeIntervalAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the testComputeIntervalAM analysis member.

var.name: testComputeIntervalCounter
var.description: number of times test_compute_interval has been called
